q1.question: For f(x), what does the transformation -f(x) do?
q1.answer: Reflect f(x) over the x axis
options: Reflect f(x) over the y axis
Reflect f(x) over the x axis

q2.question: For f(x), what does the transformation f(-x) do?
q2.answer: Reflect f(x) over the y axis
options: Reflect f(x) over the y axis
Reflect f(x) over the x axis
